QuestData.Title: Laser Location
QuestData.Description:
Phalynx have precise detection mechanisms that allow for excellent scouting.
In the cave below we have scattered gems that our units are trained to locate. Escort Gatamatos to run some drills and recalibrate his training.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Gatamatos to the Hall of Beasts, then direct him to locate $2oa Training Gems.
QuestData.RewardText: I would like to see a larion track that accurately!
